languages.text:
"Что это? Вольный Торговец вместе с предателями Дома завел Дитя в ловушку к ксеносам? Хотела бы я, чтобы глаза мне изменили. Но теперь ясно вижу, что
{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Великий Регент Ааронто{/d} не зря направил нас по следам вашего судна". {n}Крепко сложенная женщина устало сжимает в руках пистолет. Ее лицо сокрыто за драгоценной трехокой маской, а дорогое облачение Навис Нобилите покрыто следами засохшей крови и недавних боев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Что это? Вольный Торговец вместе с предателями Дома завел Дитя в ловушку к ксеносам? Хотела бы я, чтобы глаза мне изменили. Но теперь ясно вижу, что Великий Регент Ааронто не зря направил нас по следам вашего судна". {n}Крепко сложенная женщина устало сжимает в руках пистолет. Ее лицо сокрыто за драгоценной трехокой маской, а дорогое облачение Навис Нобилите покрыто следами засохшей крови и недавних боев.{/n}

languages.text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Великий Регент Ааронто{/d} не зря направил нас по следам вашего судна". {n}Крепко сложенная женщина устало сжимает в руках пистолет. Ее лицо сокрыто за драгоценной трехокой маской, а дорогое облачение Навис Нобилите покрыто следами засохшей крови и недавних боев.{/n}

But now I can see clearly that Great Regent Aaronto was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, yet there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind an encrusted three-eyed mask, and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are marred by dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

languages.text: 「これは何だ？自由開拓者とオーセリオ家の裏切り者が、異種族の罠にはめようと御子をおびき出したというのか？私の見間違いだといいのだが。{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}大摂政アーロント{/d}があなたの船を探しに私を送り出したのは正しかったと、今になってよくわかる」{n}がっしりした体格の女性は拳銃を装備している。しかし、その立ち居振る舞いには極度の疲労がところどころ現れている。彼女の顔は宝石をちりばめた三つ目で飾られた仮面に隠れており、精緻な作りの航宙貴族の服は乾いた血、他にも最近の戦闘を示す証であちこち染まっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これは何だ？自由開拓者とオーセリオ家の裏切り者が、異種族の罠にはめようと御子をおびき出したというのか？私の見間違いだといいのだが。{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}大摂政アーロント{/d}があなたの船を探しに私を送り出したのは正しかったと、今になってよくわかる」{n}がっしりした体格の女性は拳銃を装備している。しかし、その立ち居振る舞いには極度の疲労がところどころ現れている。彼女の顔は宝石をちりばめた三つ目で飾られた仮面に隠れており、精緻な作りの航宙貴族の服は乾いた血、他にも最近の戦闘を示す証であちこち染まっている。{/n}

languages.text: “这是怎么回事？行商浪人和家族的叛徒沆瀣一气，把圣子引诱到了异形设下的陷阱里？我真希望是我看错了，但我现在明白了，{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}阿伦托摄政王{/d}派我们跟踪你的船，这实在是个英明的决定。”{n}这位身材魁梧的女性拿着手枪，但浑身散发着疲惫的迹象。她的脸隐藏在镶满宝石的三眼面具后面，精致的导航宗族外袍上留着近期战斗的痕迹，还沾着干涸的血迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是怎么回事？行商浪人和家族的叛徒沆瀣一气，把圣子引诱到了异形设下的陷阱里？我真希望是我看错了，但我现在明白了，阿伦托摄政王派我们跟踪你的船，这实在是个英明的决定。”{n}这位身材魁梧的女性拿着手枪，但浑身散发着疲惫的迹象。她的脸隐藏在镶满宝石的三眼面具后面，精致的导航宗族外袍上留着近期战斗的痕迹，还沾着干涸的血迹。{/n}

languages.text: « Que se passe-t-il ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} et les traîtres à notre maison auraient-ils attiré l'Enfant dans un piège xénos ? Si seulement ce n'était qu'un mauvais rêve... mais maintenant, je comprends mieux pourquoi le {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}vénérable régent Aaronto{/d} nous a envoyés à la poursuite de votre vaisseau. »{n}Bien qu'armée d'un pistolet, la femme à forte carrure a l'air complètement épuisée. Son visage est dissimulé derrière un masque à trois yeux incrusté de gemmes, et ses vêtements raffinés de la Navis Nobilite sont couverts de sang séché, preuve s'il en faut qu'elle a récemment participé à un combat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Que se passe-t-il ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} et les traîtres à notre maison auraient-ils attiré l'enfant dans un piège xénos ? Si seulement ce n'était qu'un mauvais rêve... mais maintenant, je comprends mieux pourquoi le vénérable régent Aaronto nous a envoyés à la poursuite de votre vaisseau. » {n}Bien qu'armée d'un pistolet, la femme à forte carrure a l'air complètement épuisée. Son visage est dissimulé derrière un masque à trois yeux, et ses vêtements raffinés de la Navis Nobilite sont couverts de sang séché, preuve s'il en faut qu'elle a récemment participé à un combat.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué es esto? ¿{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y los traidores a la casa han atraído a la niña a una trampa xenos? Ojalá me engañaran los ojos, pero es evidente que el {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}gran regente Aaronto{/d} estaba en lo cierto al enviarnos tras su nave». {n}La mujer de complexión fuerte está armada con una pistola, pero, aun así, hay indicios de agotamiento en su postura. Una máscara engastada de gemas con tres ojos oculta su rostro, y sus elaboradas vestimentas de la Navis Nobilite están manchadas de sangre seca y otros rastros de un combate reciente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué es esto? ¿{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y los traidores a la casa han atraído a la niña a una trampa xenos? Ojalá me engañaran los ojos, pero es evidente que el gran regente Aaronto estaba en lo cierto al enviarnos tras su nave». {n}La mujer de complexión fuerte está armada con una pistola, pero, aun así, hay indicios de agotamiento en su postura. Una máscara engastada con tres ojos oculta su rostro, y sus elaboradas vestimentas de la Navis Nobilite están manchadas de sangre seca y otros rastros de un combate reciente.{/n}

languages.text: "Was ist das? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} und die Verräter am Haus haben das Kind in eine von Xenos gestellte Falle gelockt? Ich wünschte, meine Augen würden mich trügen. Doch nun sehe ich deutlich, dass der {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Große Regent Aaronto{/d} recht daran getan hat, uns Euer Schiff verfolgen zu lassen." {n}Die robust gebaute Frau ist mit einer Pistole bewaffnet, und doch sieht man in ihrer Haltung Anzeichen von Erschöpfung. Ihr Gesicht ist hinter einer juwelenbesetzten dreiäugigen Maske verborgen, und ihre aufwändigen Navis-Nobilite-Gewänder sind voll vertrocknetem Blut und anderen Anzeichen eines Kampfs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was war das? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} und die Verräter am Haus haben das Kind in eine von Xenos gestellte Falle gelockt? Ich wünschte, meine Augen würden mich trügen. Doch nun sehe ich deutlich, dass der Große Regent Aaronto recht daran getan hat, uns Euer Schiff verfolgen zu lassen." {n}Die robust gebaute Frau ist mit einer Pistole bewaffnet, und doch sieht man in ihrer Haltung Anzeichen von Erschöpfung. Ihr Gesicht ist hinter einer verkrusteten dreiäugigen Maske verborgen, und ihre aufwändigen Navis-Nobilite-Gewänder sind voll vertrocknetem Blut und anderen Anzeichen eines Kampfs.{/n}

"Was ist das? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} und die Verräter am Haus haben das Kind in eine von Xenos gestellte Falle gelockt? Ich wünschte, meine Augen würden mich trügen. Doch nun sehe ich deutlich, dass der Große Regent Aaronto recht daran getan hat, uns Euer Schiff verfolgen zu lassen." {n}Die robust gebaute Frau ist mit einer Pistole bewaffnet, und doch sieht man in ihrer Haltung Anzeichen von Erschöpfung. Ihr Gesicht ist hinter einer juwelenbesetzten dreiäugigen Maske verborgen, und ihre aufwändigen Navis-Nobilite-Gewänder sind voll vertrocknetem Blut und anderen Anzeichen eines Kampfs.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne bu hâl? Hür Tacir ve Hane'ye ihanet edenler, Çocuk'u zenoların tuzağına mı çekmiş? Kör olaydım da görmeyeydim. {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Yüce Naip Aaronto{/d}, bizi geminizin peşine düşürmekte haklıymış. Bunu artık net bir şekilde görebiliyorum." {n}Yapılı kadın, elinde bir tabanca tutsa da yorgunluğu duruşundan belli oluyor. Süslü, üç gözlü bir maskeyle yüzünü saklıyor. Gösterişli Navis Nobilite giysisinde, kurumuş kan lekeleriyle birlikte yakın zamanda yaşanan bir çatışmadan kalma başka izler de bulunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this? The Rogue Trader and the traitors to the House have lured the Child into a trap set by xenos? I wish my eyes were deceiving me. But now I can see clearly that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Great Regent Aaronto{/d} was right to send us after your vessel." {n}The sturdily built woman is armed with a pistol, and yet, there are signs of exhaustion in her posture. Her face is hidden behind a gem-encrusted three-eyed mask and her elaborate Navis Nobilite vestments are stained with dried blood and other evidence of recent combat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne bu hâl? Hür Tacir ve Hanenin hainleri, Çocuk'u zenoların tuzağına mı çekmiş? Kör olaydım da görmeyeydim. {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenAlive}Yüce Naip Aaronto{/d}, geminizin peşine düşmemizi sağlarken haklıymış; bunu artık net bir şekilde görebiliyorum." {n}Yapılı kadın elinde bir tabanca tutsa da, yorgunluğu duruşundan belli oluyor. Süslü ve üç gözlü bir maskeyle yüzünü saklıyor. Gösterişli Navis Nobilite giysisinde, kurumuş kan lekeleriyle birlikte yakın zamanlı arbedelerden kalma başka izler de bulunuyor.{/n}
